TopicTitle: As someone useless with altering mods... I could use some help

Articles.Content: As well all know, p-Wings and stretchy fuel tanks are excellent mods. But p-Wings can't have fuel in them right now (which would be quite ideal) and stretchy tanks don't give your plane lift. So... has anyone any ideas for allowing p-Wings to have procedural fuel capacity that stretchy tanks gives?
Why not just bring it up to the author of pWings?

A few weeks back I said it would be a good idea and I think he said it was planned... but whether or not he's working on it I figured rather than bothering him again with that I'd try to learn something (for the future!).

Add a Modular Fuel Tanks module of some incredibly huge volume and basemass = -1. Then add as much fuel as you dare to your wings.

(the volume won't rescale based on wing size, but you can adjust fuel loading manually to fit...)

Oh, and you need to run a fuel line from the wing to the fuselage.
